name: speedy-net
description: Speedy Net is a new social network which will have apps, such as Speedy Match (a dating/matching app for singles) and Speedy Composer and Speedy Mail (later). Speedy Net is open to all ages - vegan, vegetarian or carnists, men, women or other. Speedy Net will be vegan-friendly and friendly to human rights, peace and animal rights.
